subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk and Patrik Elias scored in the shootout and Martin Brodeur stopped both Florida attempts as the Devils won for the fourth time in five games, 3-2.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk and Patrik Elias scored in the shootout and Martin Brodeur stopped both Florida attempts as the Devils won for the fourth time in five games, 3-2.
